https://stackoverflow.com/questions/34207995/how-to-define-s4-method-for-taking-the-opposite-of-the-object?rq=1

```{r}
setClass("testClass", 
                 representation(a="numeric"))

setMethod("Arith", c(e1="testClass", e2="missing"),
                    function(e1, e2) {
                        op = .Generic[[1]]
                        switch(op,
                            `-` = return(-e1@a)
                        )
                    }
)

tc <- new("testClass", a=2)
-tc
```
